mcq.statement: During which event did Quaid-e-Azam refer to Islam as "Our bedrock and sheet anchor"?

options.b: Session of All India Muslim League

mcq.one_liner: Quaid-e-Azam described Islam as "Our bedrock and sheet anchor" in his address to the **Punjab Students Federation**.
